meanings.definition: Of or relating to the theater
meanings.sent1: The children put on a theatric play for their parents.
meanings.sent2: The theatric performance captivated the audience with its colorful costumes.
meanings.sent3: The theatric production had everyone laughing at the exaggerated gestures.

meanings.sent5: The theatric lighting transformed the stage into a magical world.

meanings.definition: Dramatic or exaggerated in behavior or speech
meanings.sent1: She gave a theatric gasp when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: His theatric reaction to the news made everyone burst into laughter.
